seprhou.network

Interface GameEndpoint

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultiClient, MultiServer, NetworkCommon, SinglePlayer

    public interface GameEndpoint
extends Closeable
    An endpoint of the game

    This interface allows the GUI code to interface with the network code without worrying about if we're the server, client or on a single player game.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actBegin()
      Method called at the start of the global act method
      void actEnd(float delta)
      Method called at the end of the global act method

      Closes the network endpoint
      Airspace getAirspace()
      Returns the airspace controlled by this endpoint

      Returns the exception which caused the connection to close

      Handover an aircraft to the other player

    • Method Detail

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the network endpoint
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable

      • getState

        GameEndpointState getState()
        Returns the state of the endpoint

      • getFailException

        IOException getFailException()
        Returns the exception which caused the connection to close

        If getState() returns GameEndpointState.CLOSED, then you can call this method to get the reason. Often, this method will still return null if no extra information can be obtained.

      • getAirspace

        Airspace getAirspace()
        Returns the airspace controlled by this endpoint

        Returns NULL if no game is active (eg connecting, waiting for connection, game ended, etc)

        Returns:
        the active airspace or null if no game is active

      • getMyColour

        AircraftColour getMyColour()
        Returns the colour used for aircraft controlled by this endpoint

      • actBegin

        void actBegin()
        Method called at the start of the global act method

        You should call this method once per frame, before acting on anything in the airspace.

        This method will receive + process messages from the other endpoint

      • actEnd

        void actEnd(float delta)
        Method called at the end of the global act method

        You should call this method once per frame, after acting on anything in the airspace.

        This method will refresh the airspace and send updates / requests to the other endpoint

        Parameters:
        delta - time since last frame (seconds)

      • takeOff

        void takeOff()
        Ask one aircraft to take off

        The request may not take affect immediately (it may need a network roundtrip)

      • handover

        void handover(Aircraft object)
        Handover an aircraft to the other player

        The request may not take affect immediately (it may need a network roundtrip)

        Parameters:
        object - aircraft to handover

      • setTargetVelocity

        void setTargetVelocity(AirspaceObject object,
                     Vector2D velocity)
        Sets the target velocity of an aircraft

        The request may not take affect immediately (it may need a network roundtrip)

        Parameters:
        object - object to change
        velocity - new velocity

      • setTargetAltitude

        void setTargetAltitude(AirspaceObject object,
                     float altitude)
        Sets the target altitude of an aircraft

        The request may not take affect immediately (it may need a network roundtrip)

        Parameters:
        object - object to change
        altitude - new altitude
